mapper.select: SELECT STDNT.STDNT_SN AS "stdntSn", STDNT.STDNT_NM AS "stdntNm", STDNT.STDNT_TELNO AS "stdntTelNo", STDNT.STDNT_EML_ADDR AS "stdntEmlAddr", STDNT.STDNT_BRDT AS "stdntBrdt", STDNT.STDNT_ADDR AS "stdntAddr", STDNT.STDNT_GRD AS "stdntGrd", STDNT.SCSBJT_CD AS "scsbjtCd", STDNT.USER_NO AS "userNo", STDNT.ACAVSR_NO AS "acavsrNo", TNG_STDNT.TTRHR AS "stdntHr", TNG_STDNT.INDST_EVL_YN AS "idnstEvlYn", TNG_GRD.GRD AS "grd" FROM STDNT LEFT JOIN TNG_STDNT ON STDNT.STDNT_SN = TNG_STDNT.STDNT_SN LEFT JOIN TNG_GRD ON TNG_STDNT.TNG_APLY_NO = TNG_GRD.TNG_APLY_NO AND TNG_GRD.WRT_CD = 20 WHERE TNG_NO = #{tngNo} AND TNG_PRGRS_STTS = '30'
Select TNG_APLY_NO AS "tngAplyNo" FROM TNG_STDNT WHERE TNG_NO=#{tngNo} AND STDNT_SN=#{stdntSn}
Select BZENTY_USER_NO AS "bzentyUserNo", SEMESTER AS "semester" FROM TNG WHERE TNG_NO=#{tngNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TNG_STDNT SET INDST_EVL_YN = 'Y' WHERE TNG_NO = #{tngNo} AND STDNT_SN =#{stdntSn}
